column4: Occasionally when I reboot my computer "ubuntu-server-9.10" it show the grub menu with list of kernels and no timer !!! This is really really irritating since then I have to physically go to the computer to choose the kernel :( Why does this keep happening?
doesn't really help -- it shows my current kernel and the recovery opton and is stuck there anyway. The point is, there's no count down timer
you'll get your timer back if you delete old kernels
